ctx: induction l as [| a l' IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment drop := fun n : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => list nat -> list nat) (fun l : list nat => l) (fun (_ : nat) (Hrecn : list nat -> list nat) (l : list nat) => Hrecn match l with | nil => nil | _ :: l0 => l0 end) n : nat -> list nat -> list nat n : nat Unable to unify "0" with "codeNth (S n) 0".

ctx: induction l as [| a l' IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment drop := fun n : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => list nat -> list nat) (fun l : list nat => l) (fun (_ : nat) (Hrecn : list nat -> list nat) (l : list nat) => Hrecn match l with | nil => nil | _ :: l0 => l0 end) n : nat -> list nat -> list nat a : nat l' : list nat IH : codeNth 0 (codeList l') = nth 0 l' 0 Unable to unify "a" with "codeNth 0 (S (cPair a (codeList l')))".

ctx: induction l as [| a l' IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment n, a : nat l' : list nat IH : codeNth (S n) (codeList l') = nth (S n) l' 0 Unable to unify "nth n l' 0" with "codeNth (S n) (S (cPair a (codeList l')))".

original: intros n l. induction l as [| a l' IH]. - simpl. destruct n; reflexivity. - simpl. destruct n. + simpl. reflexivity. + simpl. rewrite IH. reflexivity.
